item.description:
It's our Anniversary celebration! 17 years!
Come join us for a wonderful, elegant brunch buffet in East Hampton.
We've reserved space in the center room (with a cozy fireplace).
Brunch is sumptious. Come and help us celebrate.

February is "Have a Heart for Marfan" month. We traditionally have a teacup auction with proceeds going to the National Marfan Foundation. (Contact Sharon H. if you have items to donate).

If the temps remain low, the lake (Lake Pocotopaug) may be frozen. Any brave souls want to ice skate afterwards???
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for the TALL club at the desk
item.name: HHTC 17th Anniversary Brunch
